video.title: Carmen Sandiego
video.synopsis: A master thief who uses her skills for good, Carmen Sandiego travels the world foiling V.I.L.E.'s evil plans -- with help from her savvy sidekicks.

episodes.synopsis: Mischievous orphan Carmen enrolls at V.I.L.E. Academy, a school for thieves. Given the code name Black Sheep, she makes fast friends ... and enemies.
episodes.title: Becoming Carmen Sandiego: Part I

episodes.synopsis: Carmen crashes the graduates' caper, touching down at an archaeological dig site. But learning the truth about V.I.L.E. sets her on a new path.
episodes.title: Becoming Carmen Sandiego: Part II

episodes.synopsis: Player navigates Carmen, Zack and Ivy to a secret lab in Indonesia, where V.I.L.E. is developing a fungus designed to destroy the country's rice.
episodes.title: The Sticky Rice Caper

episodes.synopsis: While exploring a shipwreck off the coast of Ecuador, Carmen stumbles upon hidden treasure -- and an old rival. Meanwhile, two agents kidnap Devineaux.
episodes.title: The Fishy Doubloon Caper

episodes.synopsis: In Amsterdam, Carmen goes undercover to nab a mastermind who's been replacing priceless paintings with amazingly accurate forgeries.
episodes.title: The Duke of Vermeer Caper

episodes.synopsis: Carmen tangles with V.I.L.E. operative Le Chevre at the Sydney Opera House. Crackle's there, too -- but he doesn't recognize Carmen. Hmmm.
episodes.title: The Opera in the Outback Caper

episodes.synopsis: When V.I.L.E. schemes to steal the Magna Carta from a Mumbai museum, Carmen squares off with a former classmate: origami expert Paper Star.
episodes.title: The Chasing Paper Caper

episodes.synopsis: In foggy San Francisco, Carmen attends an elegant charity auction. When Mime Bomb steals a $10 million stamp, Carmen follows his trail to Chinatown.
episodes.title: The Lucky Cat Caper

episodes.synopsis: Suspecting Carmen isn't working alone, Shadowsan and Coach Brunt interrogate Devineaux. Carmen uncovers the truth about her mysterious past.
episodes.title: The French Connection Caper

episodes.synopsis: After spotting a V.I.L.E. operative in Prague, Carmen travels to Rio de Janeiro to find the source of stolen alexandrite gemstones.
episodes.title: The Hot Rocks of Rio Caper, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Carmen, Ivy and Zack track V.I.L.E. through Rio and uncover a devious plot at a colorful Carnival parade.
episodes.title: The Hot Rocks of Rio Caper, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Carmen and her crew jet off to Japan, V.I.L.E. sets a trap by stealing a priceless samurai sword from a castle.
episodes.title: The Daisho Caper

episodes.synopsis: The gang plays fashion police in Milan when V.I.L.E. designs hats with mind-control devices that turn runway models into thieves.
episodes.title: The Fashionista Caper

episodes.synopsis: Carmen, Ivy and Zack reminisce about the caper that first brought them together: catching V.I.L.E. with a stash of counterfeit cash.
episodes.title: The Boston Tea Party Caper

episodes.synopsis: Carmen and the team zoom off to a posh party in Dubai to steal a high-speed supercar before V.I.L.E. can get to it first.
episodes.title: The Need for Speed Caper

episodes.synopsis: Carmen enlists an old friend's help for a high-tech heist: breaking into Dr. Bellum's New Zealand lab to disable a dangerous device.
episodes.title: The Crackle Goes Kiwi Caper

episodes.synopsis: As A.C.M.E. closes in on Carmen in Sweden, she finds herself in a perilous predicament -- and it's up to Ivy to thwart V.I.L.E.'s latest scheme.
episodes.title: The Stockholm Syndrome Caper

episodes.synopsis: After recovering from her icy ordeal, Carmen travels to Botswana to bust up an illegal diamond mining operation.
episodes.title: The African Ice Caper

episodes.synopsis: Rocked by a new revelation about her past, Carmen returns to V.I.L.E. Island to uncover the truth.
episodes.title: The Deep Dive Caper

episodes.synopsis: Carmen searches for clues to her mother's identity in Veracruz, Mexico, where she befriends a fierce luchadora: a masked wrestler!
episodes.title: The Luchadora Tango Caper

episodes.synopsis: As Mexico City celebrates Día de los Muertos — the Day of the Dead — Carmen tracks a young art thief who's just been recruited by V.I.L.E.
episodes.title: The Day of the Dead Caper

episodes.synopsis: In New Orleans, a celebrity chef hosts a costume gala at his spooky mansion. V.I.L.E. crashes the party — but what are they after?
episodes.title: The Haunted Bayou Caper

episodes.synopsis: Carmen, Ivy and Zack reunite with an old friend in Venice, where V.I.L.E. plots to steal priceless masks from a museum.
episodes.title: The Masks of Venice Caper

episodes.synopsis: Carmen and her crew break into the Tower of London to stop V.I.L.E. from nabbing the Crown Jewels. But it's a trap!
episodes.title: The Jolly Good Show Caper

episodes.synopsis: V.I.L.E. plots to kidnap a dignitary who manages China's largest gold reserve, setting the stage for a high-flying battle at a Beijing opera house.
episodes.title: The Beijing Bullion Caper

episodes.synopsis: While Zack stays home with Shadowsan, Carmen and Ivy jet off to Bavaria to track a vicious villain and a stash of stolen gold.
episodes.title: The Big Bad Ivy Caper

episodes.synopsis: Carmen and Ivy fight a giant robot at a science museum in Singapore. Later, a tip from Player sends the friends to Iceland.
episodes.title: The Robo Caper

episodes.synopsis: Carmen heads to V.I.L.E.'s hideout in the Himalayas on a rescue mission. She needs Player's help — but he's stuck in school.
episodes.title: The Himalayan Rescue Caper

episodes.synopsis: The friends race against V.I.L.E. on the hunt for ancient treasure, searching for three relics hidden in different parts of the world.
episodes.title: The V.I.L.E. History Caper

episodes.synopsis: Jules works to crack the final code, pointing Carmen to the pyramids of Giza. But V.I.L.E. throws a wrench in their plans.
episodes.title: The Egyptian Decryption Caper

episodes.synopsis: Shadowsan, Ivy and Zack fly to Vienna to intercept V.I.L.E.'s latest heist, hoping it'll lead them to the missing Carmen.
episodes.title: The Viennese Waltz Caper

episodes.synopsis: As Carmen sinks further into V.I.L.E.'s clutches, her crew teams up with A.C.M.E. to get the old Carmen back. But is it too late?
episodes.title: The Dark Red Caper
